what_are_cookies.title: What Are Cookies
what_are_cookies.description: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer by websites that you visit. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to website owners.

how_we_use.title: How We Use Cookies
how_we_use.description: We use cookies for the following purposes:
items: To enable certain functions of the website

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website.

preference.title: Preference Cookies
preference.description: These cookies remember your settings and preferences.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites.

managing.title: Managing Cookies
managing.description: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies that are already on your computer and you can set most browsers to prevent them from being placed.

third_party.title: Third-Party Cookies
third_party.description: Some cookies are placed by third-party services that appear on our pages.

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
updates.description: We may update this cookie policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at:

ordering.question: How do I place an order?
ordering.answer: You can place an order directly on our website by adding products to your cart and proceeding to checkout. Follow these simple steps: 1) Browse our products, 2) Select your desired items, 3) Add them to your cart, 4) Review your cart, and 5) Complete the checkout process.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and Apple Pay. All transactions are secure and encrypted for your safety.

shipping.question: How long does shipping take?
shipping.answer: Standard shipping typically takes 3-5 business days within the United States. International shipping may take 7-14 business days. Express shipping options are available for faster delivery.

returns.question: What is your return policy?
returns.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for most items. Products must be in their original condition with all packaging and accessories. Custom-made items may have different return conditions.

warranty.question: Do your products come with a warranty?
warranty.answer: Yes, all our optical products come with a minimum 1-year warranty against manufacturing defects. Premium products may have extended warranty coverage. Please check individual product pages for specific warranty details.

reviews.title: Customer Reviews
reviews.be_first: Be the first to review this product

sphereDesc: The main power of your lens. Negative values correct nearsightedness, positive values correct farsightedness.
cylinderDesc: The amount of astigmatism correction needed. This value can be positive or negative.
axisDesc: The orientation of the cylinder power, measured in degrees from 0 to 180.
pdDesc: Your Pupillary Distance (PD) is the distance between your pupils, measured in millimeters. This measurement ensures your lenses are properly centered.
pdMethod1: Ask your eye care professional during your eye exam
pdMethod2: Use our online PD measurement tool
pdMethod3: Measure at home using a ruler and mirror
learnPDMeasurement: Learn how to measure PD at home
uvFilterDesc: Protects your eyes from harmful UV radiation
hardenedDesc: Extra protection against scratches and impacts
selfCleaningCoatingDesc: Special coating that repels dirt and water
superhydrophobicCoatingDesc: Advanced water-repellent coating for crystal clear vision
antiReflectiveDesc: Reduces glare and reflections for better vision

shipping.title: Shipping & Delivery
shipping.intro: We offer reliable shipping options to ensure your order arrives on time and in perfect condition.
shipping.delivery_time_content: Delivery times vary depending on your location and selected shipping method.
shipping.costs_content: Shipping costs are calculated at checkout based on destination and package weight.
shipping.note: Note: Delivery times may be affected by holidays and unforeseen events.

returns.title: Return Policy
returns.intro: If you're not fully satisfied with your purchase, you can return eligible items within 30 days of delivery.
returns.condition1: Items must be unused and in their original packaging.
returns.condition2: Include all accessories, manuals, and tags.
returns.condition3: Proof of purchase (order number) is required.
returns.step1: Contact our support team to obtain a return authorization.
returns.step2: Pack your items securely and attach the provided return label.
returns.step3: Ship the package; refunds are issued after inspection.
returns.note_returns: Custom-made or personalized items may be excluded from returns unless defective.

warranty.title: Warranty
warranty.intro: We stand behind the quality of our products with a comprehensive warranty.
warranty.coverage1: Manufacturing defects in frames and lenses.
warranty.coverage2: Coating defects within the warranty period.
warranty.exclusion1: Damage from misuse, accidents, or improper care.
warranty.exclusion2: Normal wear and tear, including scratches not due to manufacturing defects.
warranty.note_warranty: Please keep your proof of purchase; warranty claims may require verification.
